alert.note: Alert for Athens; Morgan; Perry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Perry, western Morgan, northeastern Vinton and northwestern Athens Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Hope State Park, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nelsonville, New Lexington, Glouster, McConnelsville, Shawnee, Lake Hope State Park, Perry State Forest, Crooksville, Chauncey, New Straitsville, Malta, Corning, Buchtel, Jacksonville, Murray City, Trimble, Hemlock, Rendville, Burr Oak State Park and The Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio.
